name: 2015-capstone-open-transportation-information-data
title: 2015 Capstone Open Transportation Information Data
description: Data for the TARC service area, defined as the 5-county region consisting of Jefferson, Bullitt, and Oldham Counties in Kentucky and Floyd and Clark Counties in Indiana. This data was sourced from the US Census Bureau, which publishes the Longitudinal Origin-Destination Employment Statistics (LODES) data.

resources.name: TARC Service Area Employment
resources.description: Point Shapefile for Louisville's The LEHD Origin-Destination Employment Statistics (LODES) dataset for the year 2011. Data on numbers of workers by Census Block Group.

resources.name: TARC Service Area Population
resources.description: Shapefile for Louisville population for the year 2011 from the US Census' ACS 5-year data. Data on numbers of persons by Census Block Group.
